attributes.contentHtml:
Ah shit, here we go again.
So, a few days ago FalixNodes got raided. During that time, I believe they lost their vanity .gg/FalixNodes, and it was claimed by a company going by the name of "Helio Nodes". Since they were using the vanity of FalixNodes, they gained quite a lot of members. So, I decided to open a ticket in their Discord, a staff member responded within a few minutes, but as soon as I asked for their privacy policy, he started ignoring me. I got a response after a few hours, and the S1 member told me "I think we haven't privacy policy lol". When I told them that its illegal he started acting in a childish manner and was joking about it.

On top of that, the owner himself can sometimes be toxic in the chat at times. If that was not enough, they even delete all of the bad reviews that they get and the user leaving them gets banned. Oh, and of course their staff is unprofessional, childish and toxic at times.

All of the screenshots can be found here:
https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/828989597978591252/830843376643473428/Screenshot_35.png?width=772&height=434 https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/828989597978591252/830843380644446218/Screenshot_36.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/828989597978591252/830843382275244082/Screenshot_37.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/828989597978591252/830843382875160576/Screenshot_39.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/828989597978591252/830843386511753236/Screenshot_38.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/828989597978591252/830843387548401755/Screenshot_40.png

Their Discord: https://discord.gg/FalixNodes
